https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iu21LZh3bDSQlf0XkxYeU4hehn3.jpg For 31 years Dennis Rader aka BTK killer was able to live a double life. This documentary chronicle's comprehensive interviews with law enforcement, victim's family members, reporters and his daughter Kerri Rawson. BTK: A Killer Among Us
